Articles.Content:
Hey, 

I m searching for a simple **washer part/texture/model**.

If one of the latter, I could write the config myself.

It should have good enough texture so that it does not look bad when rescaled/tweakscaled up to 5m diameter and be relatively flat.

About the texture colors I m not too particular, however something "neutral" (greyish/blackish) would be preferrable.

I would use it as a workaround for the ProceduralParts/TweakScale bug in general and KSPIextended compatibility in particular.

Thank you very much!

Theres one in the Infernal Robotics mod, a docking washer. Not sure if that's exactly what you're looking for. It's flat, greyish silver, and has a good texture. No idea on how well that texture responds to enlarging to 5m size.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-31T22:11:08Z" title="03/31/2015 10:11  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 31, 2015</time> by smjjames**

Thank you for the suggestion.

I tried the washer from IR, unfortunately it does not respond well to anything above 1.25m diameter.

I would not need any movement. Just something like the 2.5m stack separator with a better texture for upscaling.
